Lobbyist Name: RWE Renewables Ireland (formerly Innogy Renewables Ireland Limited)
Specific Details: To provide information on the Shancloon proposed wind farm. The study area comprises lands at Shancloon, Cloonbar, Beagh More, Derrymore, Cloonteen and Cloonsheen and measures approximately 689 hectares.
DPOs Lobbied: Donagh Mark Killilea|Councillor|Galway County Council::Karey McHugh Farag|Councillor|Galway County Council::Andrew Reddington|Councillor|Galway County Council::Shaun Cunniffe|Councillor|Galway County Council::Ollie Turner|Councillor|Galway County Council::Mary Hoade|Councillor|Galway County Council::Peter Roche|Councillor|Galway County Council
Subject Matter: To provide information on the Shancloon proposed wind farm. The study area comprises lands at Shancloon, Cloonbar, Beagh More, Derrymore, Cloonteen and Cloonsheen and measures approximately 689 hectares.
Intended Results: To ensure relevant local elected representatives are informed throughout the development phase of the project.
Lobbying Activities: Outreach to elected councillors in the Tuam LEA regarding an update briefing on Shancloon development.|Email|6-10::Meeting with Cllr. Shaun Cunniffe on Shancloon wind development.|Meeting|1::Phone call with Cllr. Mary Hoade on Shancloon wind development.|Phone call|1
